overview: This is a dynasty fantasy football league governed by these bylaws. Commissioners reserve the right to rule on edge cases in the spirit of fairness.
trades: Trades are allowed year-round unless otherwise stated. All trades are subject to league veto rules and commissioner review.
draft: The rookie draft consists of 4 rounds. Draft order is determined by reverse standings for non-playoff teams.
playoffs: The top 6 teams qualify for the playoffs. Division winners receive priority seeding.
tanking: Intentional tanking is not allowed. Lineups must be set in good faith each week.
fees: League dues must be paid before the rookie draft. Failure to pay may result in loss of draft picks.
